metadata.name: Best Choice 625 mg 1 Tablet film coated

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Polycarbophil is used to treat constipation and to help maintain regular bowel movements

contraindications.disease: The LD50 of calcium polycarbophil in young adult rats approximated 20 g kg
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Relieves constipation or diarrhea associated with bowel disorders and acute nonspecific diarrhea
